actionUnits.condition: MonoBehaviour (fileID: 1813076697) on collider_porte is script room2_trigger (m_Script guid f90cc8c0ee6cc9746bf3259c5e5bf2bc). Serialized fields: checkSphere=0, checkCube=1, checkPyramid=0, roomDatas->fileID 697146254, checkCompile=0. collider_porte is child of trigger_cube under Room 2. On OnTriggerEnter with a GameObject tagged 'Cube' (e.g., Cube_salle2 fileID: 194480315 or Cube_test fileID: 1269095956), room2_trigger should call room2.SetCubeCheck() on MonoBehaviour fileID 697146254 and then call Snap(trigger.position) on the colliding object's SnapToTrigger (m_Script guid 2723dba42bd113044ad231906b498006).

MonoBehaviour (fileID: 697146254) on Room 2 is script room2 (m_Script guid 82aa235159f620648803cf53217af1e5). doorAnim references Animator fileID 521131961. When SphereChecked, CubeChecked, and PyramidChecked are all true, Update() sets doorOpen=true and doorAnim.Play('DoorOpen', 0, 0.0f) is invoked. After SetCubeCheck was triggered via collider_porte, invoke SetSphereCheck and SetPyramidCheck to complete the condition and validate door opening.

Idempotency check: With doorOpen already true in room2 (fileID: 697146254) after previous step, re-invoking a cube trigger should not replay 'DoorOpen' because Update() guards with !doorOpen. This verifies the guard condition in Update().
